short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension you can comment web page even it do not have a function of comment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Freely share your comments! Many websites do not supply the function to comment, try this extension to raise your voice freely.

1.3 Social network updated. One can add friends and see the comments of your friends'.

1.2 Pizza updated, one can see the 15 newest comments and talk in the circle.

'FreeComments' is a browser extension supplying you a platform to freely raise your comments and view net friends' opinions. Have your ever seen interesting news or blogs but failed to comment on them without registering? Or have you once met bad sellers but found your commentary deleted? These are no problem here as you may give your voice freely using this extension. One time registration, everywhere free pronunciation. Unrestrained vent and ridicule, come and join us quickly!
